item.title: CVE-2024-31380|2024-08-26T08:09:38.091Z -- soflyy -- oxygen%20builder
item.description: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability in Soflyy Oxygen Builder allows Code Injection. Vendor is ignoring report, refuses to patch the issue.This issue affects Oxygen Builder: from n/a through 4.9.
